title: Shutdown Fullcast 7.09: The 2017 Big 12 Preview
description:
HUGE COACHING NEWS which we don't even get to until over halfway through this episode. That's the kind of pure professionalism you can expect from the Shutdown Fullcast and our preview of the Big 12, which includes:
- Recruiting powerhouse Kansas
- A selection of streaks Iowa State could, in theory, end
- Oklahoma State's real strange road trip plans
- Continued expectations for Texas that they can't possibly reach
- Oh right the Oklahoma thing
- Spencer pulls a Mack Brown
